numberedDirectives.content: By joining Star Corps each individual tacitly consents to give up his inalienable rights to life, liberty and adequate toilet facilities.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: Computers guilty of gross negligence, leading to the endangerment of personnel, may be replaced by a backup computer.
numberedDirectives.notes: Cited as an article

numberedDirectives.content: A living crew member always outranks a mechanoid.
numberedDirectives.notes: Used in a deleted scene

numberedDirectives.content: No food or liquids around in the work stations.
numberedDirectives.notes: Labeled as a health and safety protocol instead of a space corps directive

numberedDirectives.content: In a hostage demand situation, a hologrammatic crew member is entirely expendable.
numberedDirectives.notes: Used in a deleted scene

numberedDirectives.content: Crew members are expressly forbidden from leaving their vessel except on permission of a permit. Permits can only be issued by the Chief Navigation Officer, who is expressly forbidden from issuing them except on production of a permit.
No running in the corridors.
numberedDirectives.notes: Quoted as a protocol by Rimmer, this was a rare occasion where he actually got a SCD right. At the time Kryten was going off to fetch some clothes for a naked Irene Edgington

numberedDirectives.content: In an emergency power situation, a hologrammatic crew member must lay down his life in order that the living crew-members might survive.
Crew members in quarantine must be provided with minimum leisure facilities.
numberedDirectives.notes: Rimmer uses this as justification to provide: 'a chess set with 31 missing pieces, a knitting magazine with a pull-out special on crocheted hats, a puzzle magazine with all the crosswords completed and a video of the excellent cinematic treat, 'Wall-Papering, Painting And Stippling â€” A DIY Guide'.

numberedDirectives.content: Any officer found to have been slaughtered and replaced by a shape-changing chameleonic life form shall forfeit all pension rights.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: When a crew member has run out of credits, food or drink may not be supplied until the balance is restored.
numberedDirectives.notes: Cited as an article

numberedDirectives.content: In an emergency situation involving two or more officers of equal rank, seniority will be given to whichever officer can programme a VCR.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996). Also included on the DVD for Series 8

numberedDirectives.content: A (never actually stated) quarantine regulation, probably something like 'any member of the crew who has been exposed to a potentially dangerous illness must be quarantined to protect the rest of the crew'
numberedDirectives.notes: Referred to by Rimmer as justification for quarantining Lister, Cat and Kryten after encountering the infected hologram of Dr. Hildegard Lanstrom at a Space Corps research base

numberedDirectives.content: The crews files are for the eyes of the Captain only.
One berth per registered crew member.
Crew members may demand a re-screening after five days in quarantine showing no ill effect.
All new officers must have an accolade on promotion to be fully accredited as an officer.
numberedDirectives.notes: When Rimmer found himself temporarily made an officer through an act of gross deception, Rimmer told Kryten that he wanted his own accolade to be held in the 'Hall of Heroes' with a six gun salute, and an hour long tribute to himself

numberedDirectives.content: Terraformers are expressly forbidden from recreating Swindon.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996). In the United States, 'Swindon' is changed to 'Cleveland'. Also included on the DVD for Series 8

numberedDirectives.content: Work done by an officer's doppelganger in a parallel universe cannot be claimed as overtime.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: During temporal disturbances, no questions shall be raised about any crew member whose time-sheet shows him or her clocking off 187 years before he clocked on.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: No member of the Corps should ever report for active duty in a ginger toupee.
numberedDirectives.notes: Also appears in thhe Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: No registered vessel should attempt to traverse an asteroid belt without deflectors.
No officer above the rank of mess sergeant is permitted to go into combat with pierced nipples.

A (never actually stated) regulation relating to a crew member being unable to enter the ship for the safety of the crew when in an area of chameleonic lifeforms, although it could be that Kryten just decided to give up arguing with Rimmer rather than Rimmer quoting a valid directive.
To preserve morale during long-haul missions, all male officers above the rank of First Technician must, during panto season, be ready to put on a dress and a pair of false breasts.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: The log must be kept up to date at all times with current service records, complete mission data and a comprehensive and accurate list of all crew birthdays so that senior officers may avoid bitter and embarrassing silences when meeting in the corridor with subordinates who have not received a card.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: No officer with false teeth should attempt oral sex in zero gravity.
Suntans will be worn during off-duty hours only.
numberedDirectives.notes: From the Red Dwarf Log Book (1996)

numberedDirectives.content: A (never actually quoted) regulation, that is known to be impossible without at least one live chicken, a rabbi and involves sacrificing poultry, presumably the Jewish ritual 'Kapparot'.
Extreme caution should be taken on the naturist deck when peeling carrots.
Any officer caught sniffing the saddle of the exercise bicycle in the women's gym will be discharged without trial.

A mechanoid may issue orders to human crew members if the lives of said crew members are directly or indirectly under threat from a hitherto unperceived source and there is inadequate time to explain the precise nature of the enormous and most imminent death threat.
numberedDirectives.notes: Quoted by Kryten in the original script for 'Back to Reality'

numberedDirectives.content: At all times show your allegiance to Red Dwarf in the US by picking up your phone and calling your local public television station with your pledge.
numberedDirectives.notes: Included on the DVD for Series 8

numberedDirectives.content: All nations attending the conference are only allocated one parking space.
numberedDirectives.notes: Given the title 'The All Nations Agreement'

numberedDirectives.content: POW's have a right to non-violent constraint.

unnumberedDirectives.content: It is our primary overriding duty to contact other life forms, exchange information, and, wherever possible, bring them home.
unnumberedDirectives.notes: Listed as a primary overriding duty

unnumberedDirectives.content: In order to prevent gender ambiguity, all prisoners without a penis will be classified as female.
Space Corps super chimps committing acts of indecency in zero gravity will lose all banana privileges.
Derelict ships have to be made safe before the senior officer ventures on-board.
Any unnecessary ship should dispose of itself by flying straight into the nearest sun.
unnumberedDirectives.notes: Stated as JMC policy pursuant to the Space Pollution Act

unnumberedDirectives.content: During disposal, the ship's nuclear reactor should be fired into a black hole, along with the ship's hologram.
Individually, holograms may be off-lined and erased, with their hard-drives shot out and detonated by nuclear fusion.

The on-board computer is tasked with appraising a ship's worth to the Jupiter Mining Corporation and decommissioning it if it serves no useful purpose. This does not happen while a ship has crew performing essential duties, or even duties to an adequate level.
No ship may be decommissioned that contains living crew members who are listed on the manifest.
unnumberedDirectives.notes: Criminal acts, including violating quarantines, forfeit crew privileges in such considerations, such as rights of residency.
